ygData.subject: RE: Mana Song, some data
ygData.msgSnippet: the song does stack with other bards singing it, most likely because there is no icon associated with it and therefore other bards in same group singing it do
ygData.messageBody:
the song does stack with other bards singing it, most likely because there
is no icon associated with it and therefore other bards in same group
singing it do not get the message that their song did not take hold.

Shada

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Keith Spencer [mailto:kspencer@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, August 03, 1999 10:09 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqbards] Mana Song, some data
>
>
> From: "Keith Spencer" <kspencer@...>
>
> Got a chance to run a couple tests with my level 31 enchanter
> friend (my
> bard's 35th)
>
> Times are just for one bubble of mana....
>
> Clarity Alone : 72 seconds
> ManaSong Constant: 65 seconds
> ManaSong Juggled: 65 seconds
> Clarity+Song : 48 seconds
>
> Couldn't find another bard around to test if the song stacks
> with itself,
> that's still left to be decided but at least we're sure now
> that clarity &
> the song do stack. And the song is just like most other bard
> songs in that
> it has a 3 round effect, and can be juggled with two other
> songs w/ no drop
> in regen rate.
>
>
> Fendryl Istalindir, HalfElven Minstrel of Tarew Marr
>
